page.title: 07CHALFONT AREA EDUCATION
page.content: Introduction to{Education} In our area there are 7 schools which include 4 mixed, 1 all girls and 2 all boys.3 of the {schools} are connected with {churches}.Our school is connected with the Church of England,St Josephs with a Catholic church and the other school is called Holy Cross Convent which is also a Catholic school. Gayhurst and Thorpe House are two independent schools. Gayhurst has an upper and a lower school. In the lower school the children's ages are 4-8 years the middle school is aged 9-13 years. Lovel End School has roughly 35 children per. class. It is a mixed school with a playgroup inside the building. This school has children up to 8 years. There is one Secondary school for children from 12-16. This area is very good for education because of the wide choice of schools.
